knimeNode.name: DB Data Deleter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Deletes fitted models in the database

fullDescription.intro: Deletes fitted models in the database based on the fitted models in the input table. The output table contains an additional column with the number of rows affected by the DELETE statement. A number greater than zero indicates that the command was processed successfully.
fullDescription.option: Enter the database Path or Server connection string here.
Your log-in user name for the database.
Your log-in password for the database

ports.inPort: Table with fitted models to be deleted in the database
ports.outPort: Input table with additional column providing number of affected rows in the database
